title: Practice Challenge
description: Create a file called `introduction.dart` and write a program that prints: ---
instructions: Create a file called `introduction.dart` and write a program that prints: ---

testCases.description: Program prints motivation for learning Flutter
testCases.expectedOutput: I'm learning Flutter because I want to build my own apps!

hints.text: Use the print() function to display output. Each print() call creates a new line.
Put your text inside quotes: print('your text here');
Remember: every print statement needs a semicolon at the end.

commonMistakes.correction: Add ; at end of each print statement
Wrap your print statements in void main() { }
